about.title: About
about.p1: WebTools is a collection of fast, privacy‑friendly utilities for everyday work. Convert, format, preview and optimize files directly in your browser—no uploads, no sign‑in, and everything runs client‑side.
about.p2: This project is built with Next.js, React, and a sprinkle of neon‑styled UI. We focus on clean UX, accessible components, and speed.
